name: GTV V Cd
description: Original game disc for GTV V with collector's case. Includes single-player campaign and access to GTA Online. Compatible with major consoles and PCs. A must-have for fans of open-world action games.

name: Wireless Gaming Mouse
description: Ergonomic wireless mouse with RGB lighting and adjustable DPI. Offers precise tracking for FPS and MOBA games. Long battery life with fast USB-C charging. Designed for comfort during extended use.

name: Mechanical Keyboard
description: RGB backlit mechanical keyboard with tactile blue switches. Features anti-ghosting, customizable macros, and a detachable wrist rest. Built for gamers and coders alike. Durable metal frame ensures long-term use.

name: Gaming Headset
description: Surround sound headset with noise-canceling microphone. Immersive audio with deep bass and crisp treble. Comfortable padding for long sessions. Perfect for gaming, streaming, or conference calls.

name: Webcam HD 1080p
description: High-definition webcam with built-in noise-reducing microphone. Offers crystal-clear 1080p video at 30fps. Auto light adjustment for low-light environments. Ideal for remote work, meetings, and content creation.

name: Laptop Cooling Pad
description: Silent cooling pad with dual high-speed fans and LED lighting. USB-powered design fits laptops up to 17 inches. Prevents overheating during gaming or heavy workloads. Lightweight and portable for travel.

name: Wireless Charging Pad
description: Fast Qi wireless charger with sleek and slim design. Supports iPhone, Samsung, and other Qi-enabled devices. Built-in safety features for overcharge and heat protection. LED indicator shows charging status.

name: Bluetooth Speaker
description: Portable Bluetooth speaker with waterproof build and 360Â° sound. Long battery life up to 12 hours of playtime. Built-in mic for calls and voice assistants. Great for both indoor and outdoor use.

name: LED Monitor 24"
description: 24-inch Full HD LED monitor with ultra-slim bezel design. Features HDMI and VGA inputs, 75Hz refresh rate, and low blue light filter. Perfect for work, gaming, and content viewing. Sleek and modern look.
